segments.text: Hi , Mike . We're having a party tonight , wanna come join us ? You can bring your girlfriend .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . I am breaking up with Cathy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What happened ? Did you have a fight ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . She is really a very nice girl ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , she is . She is pretty , caring , getting easy-going and she is a great cook . She is a gem .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , you are right . But sometimes she is too caring . Well , no ... she ’ s just possessive and I kind of want a break ... you know ... for some room for myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh ? ! Did you talk with her about it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've tried , but it didn't work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So , when are you going to tell her ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe tonight . I don't know . I don't know how to tell her .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know she ’ s head over heels in love with you . She will be badly hurt !
segments.speaker: S1
